item.title: Apple (India)
item.description: Apple leads the world in innovation with iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, iOS, OS X, watchOS and more. Visit the site to learn, buy and get support.

item.title: Apple Inc. - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
item.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

item.description: Check out the latest Apple news on CNET, featuring developments on the iPhone, iPad, Macbooks, OS X and much more.

item.description: Apple support is here to help. Learn more about popular topics and find resources that will help you with all of your Apple products.
